name: Jeebo & Jerbo vs. Life
storyline: Jeebo is sick of his mundane office job so he decides to quit. His boss, BOSS, tells him that company policy is to "kill deserters" and so the whole office tries to kill him. After Jeebo escapes, BOSS destroys the entire office building in his rage. Jeebo then goes to stay with his lazy cousin who just watches TV all day. They realize that this too is unfulfilling and set off on an adventure to find meaning.
summary: An indie Metroidvania/JRPG that is heavily story-based about a goo creature who hates his job and his lazy cousin
